confcost.controller.algorithm

Class AsymmetricEncryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • confcost.controller.algorithm.Algorithm
      • confcost.controller.algorithm.Encryption
        • confcost.controller.algorithm.AsymmetricEncryption
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECIESEncryption, RSAEncryption

    public abstract class AsymmetricEncryption
extends Encryption
    Provides support for generic asymmetric encryptions.
    Author:
    Marc Eichler
